Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the significance of the image by suggesting that it shows an Indian M17 helicopter crashed in Laddakh, when in fact it is a two-year-old image of a different incident.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or supporting information to confirm that the M17 helicopter mentioned in the image is indeed crashed in Laddakh.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the image, as it was published in multiple media reports in 2018, depicting a helicopter crash near the Kedarnath temple.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is from a previous incident and not related to the current India-China border dispute.
Understate: There is no evidence of any understatement bias in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not appear to falter at times.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image depicts an Indian M17 helicopter crashed in Laddakh without providing sufficient evidence to support this assumption.
